text: 5|107|Atahpara yadi eta prakasa haya ye,tara dujana aparadhe lipta hayeche tabe yadera sbarthahani ghateche tadera madhya theke nikatatama dujana tadera sthalabarti habe ebam allah‌ra name sapatha kare balabe, ‘amadera saksya abasya'i tadera saksya theke adhikatara satya ebam amara simalanghana karini, karale abasya'i amara yalemadera antarbhukta haba [1].’
